thread.title: 10th Annual Sausage Fest @ Rusty Nickel Brewing - Buffalo Rising
thread.title_full: 10th Annual Sausage Fest @ Rusty Nickel Brewing - Buffalo Rising

author: queenseyes
title: 10th Annual Sausage Fest @ Rusty Nickel Brewing - Buffalo Rising
text:
On Saturday, January 25, Rusty Nickel Brewing will host its 10th Annual Sausage Fest (1pm – 11pm). The event is considered a “must attend” event for amateur sausage makers, and food lovers alike. This year’s event will feature:
- Live music and entertainment
- Outdoor campfires
- Food and drink specials
- Mini meat raffles
- The sausage toss game
- A homemade sausage competition
- Prizes from the event Sausage Sponsor Wardynski’s
- Special event food menus thanks to food sponsors Wardynski’s Meats, Costanzo’s Bakery, Redlinski Meats, Hanzlian’s Sausage, Strobel Farms, and US Foods
“The day is centered around a home-made sausage competition, which is free to enter and includes a complimentary beverage for the cook. Competitors ‘compete with their meat’ at a chance to win the one and only Sausage Fest Trophy for Best in Show. Additional prizes are courtesy of our premier sponsor The Sausage Maker. There are three competition categories including Breakfast, Wild Game, and Traditional Sausage. All entries qualify for the coveted Best In Show Trophy! Register your sausage here!” – Rusty Nickel Brewing Co.
The free event is open to the public.
For all the up-to-date information and announcements, visit rustynickelbrewing.com.
Rusty Nickel Brewing 4350 Seneca St, West Seneca, NY 14224
